short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A toolbox full of useful mods for the RQ repair ticket management software.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a toolbox full of useful mods for the RQ ticket management software. It includes reminders for serial numbers and quote conversions, a way to draw a customer's unlock pattern and print it out with the barcode label, and a few bug fixes.

NEW UPDATE - 7/21/24 - version 1.2.2
This is the biggest update yet, adding several highly-requested features, as well as re-works of many of the standard core features. It includes:
- Better options page
- Custom quick links can be opened as a frame inside of RepairQ
- Easier way to get to options
- Bin label text can be changed in tickets
- A new RQ Mods icon will light up every time a new update has been installed
- Instructions, update logs, and a complete list of features can now be found at benwyborney.com

This is a third-party extension. It does not collect any user information or any data from the website it runs on.
